alert.note: Alert for Alamosa; Conejos; Costilla; Saguache (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued December 12 at 5:09PM MST until December 12 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Alamosa County in southeastern Colorado... Southern Saguache County in central Colorado... Northwestern Costilla County in south central Colorado... Eastern Conejos County in south central Colorado... * Until 615 PM MST. * At 508 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located near Alamosa, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar and trained spotter. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Locations impacted include... Alamosa, Manassa, Sanford, La Jara, Romeo, Blanca, Hooper, Alamosa East, San Luis Lake, Mosca, Great Sand Dunes and Bountiful. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents.
